reviews.review_msg: Ok as person he really nice.however, as a prof, his exam long 12-14 short answers + 2 essays (u have to know both books very well), his marking scale so high, B- start from 76. I wouldn't take another class with him nor recommend him for IS210

Very engaging, very knowledgeable professor. He doesn't tend to pull punches, he will challenge you, but not to overload. Smaller class size where conversation is encouraged is where his teaching style fits best. Not everyone clicks with his sense of humour, taken out of context he can be a source of politically incorrect memes.

Absolutely fantastic prof - highly recommended. He provides notes, but make sure to go to the lectures - he's entertaining and explains things beyond the notes, which may help you understand things more.

Don't know what the person below is talking about. The amount of readings was huge, felt like a grad class. Assignment topics were incomprehensible- not sure what he wanted, and he did not give enough time to complete them. Hard to put in genuine effort when all you're trying to do is get assignments done on time.A good academic,but def not a prof.

Good reasonable prof w a sense of humour. Tries to interest students and provides numerous anecdotes and videos. Lack of coordination with TA though. Cut huge chunks of initial syllabus and switched readings,such that one course book (purchased) was not used at all. Overall, fair. Not stellar, but also no huge complaints.

One of the best classes i have taken so far. Though it required a lot of work and readings impossible to finish. Hard work does pay off. Just be sure not to read everything but what it's related to lectures

An AMAZING class and an AMAZING teacher. He does not put his lecture notes on the website so you have to go to classes. There are a lot of readings but they are all very very intereting. If you like to work hard and actually learn something definetely take it!
Be prepared to do some work but it's worth it because you actually focus on specific cases and learn a lot! He is also really cute :-)
